channel.title: Work Projects on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Work Projects on Savo's Site

item.title: 3D Magnetic Field Generator
item.description: Designed and built an alternating 3D-magnetic field generator for my research group

item.title: Force Feedback Tester
item.description: Expanded on my basic, single-axis, force feedback system to now monitor and control up to six axes and eased user configuration

item.title: Kneeload Tester
item.description: Implemented a system to allow a legacy (pre-2000) welding robot to receive force feedback from a modern computer.

item.title: Demo Show Seat
item.description: Revised the existing show seat used at demos to have its set points easily reconfigured with software. My first embedded electronics project!
